K10D0206_H0207:144b-1: zas kyis 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0206_H0207:144b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0206_H0207:144b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-0: bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag @145a *//
K10D0206_H0207:145a-2: gzhan yang dge slong pha dang /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-7: byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10D0206_H0207:145a-8: de nas moonggal gyi bu chen po 'dug pa las langs te /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-9: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0206_H0207:145a-11: bdag sngon grong khyer du bsod snyoms la mchis pa'i
K10D0206_H0207:145a-12: shul logs su mi grangs khri stong snyed mchis te
K10D0206_H0207:145a-13: / de dag gi mgo bo ni ri bzhin du che /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-14: khog pa ni ri rab lhun po tsam 'dra /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-15: mgrin pa ni khab bzhin du phra /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-16: phan tshun bskyod cing mchi ba na shing rta lnga brgya shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra byung ste /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-17: de'ang mi bzad pa'i gzhob kyi dud pa kun nas 'thul lo; ;de ci'i dngos po lags pa dang /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-18: ci las gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-21: de dag ni 'dre bkren ltogs pa yin te /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-22: sngon 'das pa'i dus na mchod sdong bshig pa dang /
K10D0206_H0207:145a-23: mchod ston sbyar ba bshig pas de lta bu'i sdig pa rnam par smin pa yin no //
K10D0206_H0207:145a-24: yang gcig tu na gzhan gyi mchod ston zos nas
K10D0206_H0207:145a-25: za gcig par ma byas pa'i sdig gi rnam par
K10D0206_H0207:145a-27: mchod ston lhag ma za gcig par mi byed pa la ma byin cig /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-0: yon bdag @145b gis lhag ma rnams dge 'dun la
K10D0206_H0207:145b-1: spags pa'i gsol ba byos la bzod par gsol cig
K10D0206_H0207:145b-2: / spags pa'i zas rnams dge 'dun rnams kyis gnang ba byin cig /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-3: gnang ba ma byin na dge 'dun rnams kyang ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:145b-4: de nas moonggal gyi bus gsol pa /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni yang dag pa'o //
K10D0206_H0207:145b-6: yon bdag su'ang rung ste chos bzhin du bsdu ba'o phyir mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor tshogs te /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-7: zas gcig par byas pa rnams ni zas kyi 'tsho ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:145b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-9: za gcig par ma byas pa rnams ni zas dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:145b-10: de ltar na nyi ma gcig za gcig pa thub na nyi ma drug khrir bsod nams dang /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-11: bza' ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:145b-12: de la de ltar ma byas pa rnams ni nyi
K10D0206_H0207:145b-13: ma khri khrag drug cur 'dre ltogs par 'gyur ro
K10D0206_H0207:145b-15: de'i sbyin pa ni shin tu lci ba yin te /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-16: gnyis na lcags kyi thu lum zos kyang sla yi /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-17: yon bdag dad pa can gyi zas ni shin tu bzhu bar dka' ste /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-18: shin tu yun ring por sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-19: tshe rabs khri phrag brgyar 'dre ltogs pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:145b-20: bsod nams kyi zas bya'o cog la nan tan cher byos shig /
K10D0206_H0207:145b-22: phu rung gi nang du khyer bar byas na tshe rabs lnga brgyar dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10D0206_H0207:146a-0: lcags kyi thu lum dmar po mchan khung g-yon @146a *//
K10D0206_H0207:146a-1: pa nas thal te mchan khung g-yas par thal lo //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-2: lhag ma mi bkur bar byos shig /
K10D0206_H0207:146a-3: chung du na khre'i 'bru gcig tsam khyer na'ang lcags kyi 'khor lo tsam du 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-4: dge bsnyen gyis kyang rung ste bsod nams kyi zas
K10D0206_H0207:146a-5: sbyar ro cog la thog ma nas myang ba'i spags
K10D0206_H0207:146a-6: pa mi bya'o // de myangs bas sbyar ba thams cad lhag ma'i spags pa mi bya'o //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-7: byas pa don med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-8: gnyis na ma byas kyang sla'o //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-10: lha thams cad mi 'gyes par 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-11: gnyen po thams cad mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-12: gang zhig myangs pa zhig yod na tshe rabs lnga khrir 'dre ltogs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-13: sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyang myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-14: gang zhig phyin chad bsod nams 'dod pas tshul bzhin
K10D0206_H0207:146a-15: du bsod nams kyi zas gtsang spras phyed pa dang
K10D0206_H0207:146a-16: / shin tu gus par sbyar la lag pa shin
K10D0206_H0207:146a-17: tu dag par bkrus nas tshod ma la sogs pa
K10D0206_H0207:146a-18: drod bag tu sbyar ro cog shig tu bkab pa
K10D0206_H0207:146a-19: / dang / rim gro bskyed de de dag kyang sngar myang bar mi bya'o //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-20: de nas bsod nams su gyur cing lha thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-21: gnyen po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146a-22: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing byin
K10D0206_H0207:146a-23: gyis rlob par 'gyur te yang dag par smra ba
K10D0206_H0207:146a-24: yin no // bsod nams rnam par smin pa ni brag ca dang /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-1: de ltar 'dre bkren ltogs pa ni thog ma mi las gyur te /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-2: thog ma lag pa mi gtsang bas dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang ma la reg pa dang /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-3: bdag gi lag pa mi gtsang bas dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang ma'i nang du bsngogs sam /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-4: zas gtsang ma'i nang du kha zas mi gtsang ba
K10D0206_H0207:146b-5: bsres te dge 'dun la sbyin pa byas pas tshe
K10D0206_H0207:146b-6: rabs lnga brgyar 'dre logs par ltung ste /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-7: rtag tu mi gtsang ba za zhing snam phyi sar mi gtsang ba za na /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-8: snam byis pa'i srung mas lcags kyi ber ka sa
K10D0206_H0207:146b-9: gdengs te 'dre logs pa de rnams phyi sa'i sar
K10D0206_H0207:146b-14: khrud ma mi gtsang ba btsog pa za zhing mi
K10D0206_H0207:146b-15: gtsang ba srung zhing bud med bu btsas pa'i khrag
K10D0206_H0207:146b-16: mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa za bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0206_H0207:146b-17: de nas tshe rabs khri phrag lnga brgyar khyi dang /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-19: spur ba la sogs pa'i lus su gyur nas rtag par mnam zhing btseg pa dang /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-20: mi gtsang ba za bar 'gyur te /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-21: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal bskal pa grangs khri stong du myong ste thar ba'i dus med do //
K10D0206_H0207:146b-23: shin tu mi zad pa'ang brjod kyi mi lang ngo //
K10D0206_H0207:146b-24: gal te lag pa pho mtshan la reg gam /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-25: lag pa mo mtshan la reg gam /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-26: lag pa mi gtsang bas dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang ma la reg gam /
K10D0206_H0207:146b-27: dge 'dun gyi kha zas la mi gtsang ba nang du bcug gam /
K10D0206_H0207:147a-0: mi gtsang ba'i zas dge 'dun zar bcug @147a *//
K10D0206_H0207:147a-1: na de lta bu'i sdig pa rnam par smin pa
K10D0206_H0207:147a-2: ni thams cad mi gnad kyi rims kyis btab pa
K10D0206_H0207:147a-3: dang / sdig par mi shes pa'o //
K10D0206_H0207:147a-4: phyin chad dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang bar byas pa dang /
K10D0206_H0207:147a-5: lag pa gtsang mas dge 'dun gyi kha zas kyi snod la bzung ba dang /
K10D0206_H0207:147a-6: lag pa gtsang mas khre 'bras bkru ba dang /
K10D0206_H0207:147a-7: kha zas gtsang ma sbyin pa byas pa ni bsod
K10D0206_H0207:147a-8: nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ro
K10D0206_H0207:147a-9: // phyin chad 'di yongs su grags pa dang /
K10D0206_H0207:147a-10: myur bu'i yid kyis zungs shig /
